3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Mission Dolores single-family home alternative, this 3 bedroom home is less than half a block to Dolores Park and includes a shared rear yard! Open plan living includes updated eat-in kitchen and living room. Renovated for modern living, this classic San Francisco flat retains its original charm with many period details including decorative fireplace, box beam ceiling, picture moldings, wainscoting and more. Perfect for today's lifestyle with in-unit laundry and a modern hall bath with shower over tub. Move-in ready with new flooring and fresh paint. Assigned storage space is included, along with space for bikes, and parking is available for purchase. Seismically retrofitted to meet modern requirements, make this tremendous Mission Dolores location yours. Enjoy some of San Francisco's best cafes, restaurants, and shopping along 18th Street and the Valencia Corridor. Walk Score 98!

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Located less than a block from the famous Dolores Park and iconic Bi-Rite Market, this full-floor flat is in a quintessential SF Victorian building with period details (high ceiling, beautiful hardwood flooring throughout, bay windows) and just 8 steps from the sidewalk to the front door. Two large bedrooms (including one with 3 Bay windows) offer flexibility in space with pocket doors that can be opened and closed between them. A third small room can be utilized as a den, office, nursery, or even a small guest room. Semi-open layout connects the dining room with a light-filled, spacious kitchen with large windows on 2 sides, as well as ample storage space and high-end stainless steel appliances. Both the living room and kitchen look out into a large, shared backyard with a beautifully-kept rose garden). A spacious laundry closet room houses in-unit Electrolux washer and dryer. The unit is completed by a deeded storage space in the basement level. Walk to MUNI, tech shuttles, many restaurants/shops on Valencia St and 18th St including Bi-Rite and Tartine.
Confidential Remarks: Please visit property website for 3D Matterport Tour: https://3627-19th.com Two light fixtures in the living room, one ceiling light in the dining room, and one ceiling light in the front bedroom are NOT included on the sale.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Fresh Price! Imagine living in a stunning full-floor flat in the highly desirable Mission Dolores neighborhood, just steps from Dolores Park and the vibrant Valencia Street corridor. This rarely available home features a flexible floor plan that can be used as a 2 or 3 bedroom, making it perfect for a variety of lifestyles. Upon entering, you're greeted by a lovely foyer with an original stained glass window. Light-filled rooms with two fireplaces create a warm and inviting atmosphere, perfect for relaxing and entertaining. The gourmet kitchen is equipped with everything you need to create culinary masterpieces, and the in-unit washer and dryer make life a breeze. Recently remodeled bathrooms with high-end fixtures and finishes offer a luxurious and modern bathing experience. The shared south-facing garden is a perfect oasis for enjoying sunny days and nights. The deeded large storage area provides ample space for all your belongings. This home is truly one of a kind. Experience the luxury of living in this prime Mission Dolores location. Leased parking typically available nearby for approx $300 mth.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Impeccable Italianate Victorian with captivating spaces and flawless finishes on tree-lined, walkable block of dreamy Liberty St. Across the finialed gate, the striking facade foretells of the enchanting interior ambiance. Careful 19th cent craftsmanship is upheld by modern day artisans who have lovingly restored the old, and enlivened the new. Exquisite Bulthaup kitchen w/ Gaggenau, Subzero & abundant cabinetry for everything in its right place. Gather at the island or lounge in the breakfast area stepping out through fully retractable doors onto the ipe deck and spa. Privacy, quiet, sun, & calm amidst your 30 foot pittosporum just steps from Dolores Park. Up a solidly built original set of stairs, free from creaks after 150 years, to three generous bedrooms and a fourth smaller nursery, office, or guest room. Sleep soundly in the peaceful primary ensuite with a single cut marble shower for a ceremonious daily ablution, double sinks, & custom walnut closets. View deck to greet the pink morning cortado and sunset champagne toasts. Radiant heat offers clean and quiet warmth. Lovely lighting throughout ensures your guests and you will feel beautiful day and night. Attic can be dormered. Three cars! EV charger. Walk to all the best fun along vibrant Valencia and up 22nd.
Confidential Remarks: https://app.disclosures.io/link/76-Liberty-Street-doklepeb
Directions to Property: Liberty is a small street btwn 20th and 21st! Head

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: This luxury top-floor 2BR/2BA condo designed by an award-winning architect is located in the highly coveted Mission Dolores neighborhood. In a well-maintained boutique 2-unit building, this turnkey home is filled with natural light and features extensive renovations with timeless finishes and superior craftsmanship. Perfect for comfortable living, the spacious living room and dining room provide an inviting open layout concept overlooking the scenic park across the street. The stunning gourmet kitchen features walnut cabinetry, quartz countertops, walk-in pantry, and stainless-steel appliances including gas range. Both bedrooms boast built-in custom closets, while the primary suite offers a spa-like bathroom for added luxury. A private patio directly accessible off the home leads to a special premier private rooftop deck with panoramic city views and is ideal for outdoor entertaining. Additional amenities include in-unit laundry, hardwood floors, dual-pane windows and 1-car garage parking. Conveniently situated near Dolores Park, upscale shops, renowned restaurants, public transit and shuttles, this home has a Walk Score of 98. Whether you're enjoying the renovated home or the private rooftop deck, this residence offers an unparalleled living experience in the heart of the city.
Confidential Remarks: Easy to show call Josh Burns at 415-307-2463.
Directions to Property: On 19th Between Guerrero St and Linda St.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Welcome to this chic, urban oasis on a beautiful tree-lined street. This home features beautiful period details, but at the same time, has been tastefully appointed to meet todays' easy living. The sun-filled living/dining areas greet you as you enter this lovely home. Off the hallway, you will find 3 bedrooms (one currently used as an en-suite kid's study/sitting room), 2 full baths and a sun-drenched eat-in and well-appointed kitchen. Off the kitchen is a lovely private deck with a sitting area and large BBQ. On the ground level there is a very stunning and magical bonus room equipped with a full bath and little kitchenette. A large garage with 2 car parking and oodles of storage rounds out this wonderful condo. This is the one you've been waiting for!

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Don't miss the opportunity to make this your new SF home! Nestled in the coveted neighborhood of Dolores Heights, this Victorian condo lives like a single family house. You will love the grand interiors, classic details, tall ceilings, and high-end modern updates. The stunning chef's kitchen is a culinary enthusiast's dream complete with modern appliances and French doors that open onto a covered deck, perfect for al fresco dining and entertaining. Main level: 2 large bedrooms, full bathroom with bathtub, formal dining room, and lovely living room with sun drenched window seat to read books and watch the world go by. The lower level, thoughtfully added with permits, presents a deluxe primary bedroom suite. It includes a spacious walk-in closet, an en-suite luxury bathroom, and an adjacent office or nursery. Tall sliding glass doors open up to a shared garden. Radiant heated floors provide warmth and comfort throughout the home. Explore the vibrant neighborhood and its proximity to the best shops and eateries along the Valencia Corridor & 24th Street in Noe Valley. Dolores Park, a beloved city gem, is just a short stroll away. Easy access to MUNI, BART, Tech shuttles, & 101 and 280, you'll enjoy a seamless commute to work or play.
Confidential Remarks: Easy to show, call or text Jeny at 415-640-8011 for CBS lockbox code. Bring your clients by before they pull the listing on 11/30. Sellers are very reasonable and would love to make a deal before the holidays!

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Gracefully rising to views of the downtown skyline, the 4 Butterflies is a boutique luxury building with an architecturally significant modern design. Discerning buyers can choose from a collection of four distinctive new construction condominium homes, each outfitted with high-end European appliances and premium amenities & finishes. Unit 2 offers an open concept living/kitchen/dining in an airy, full-floor flat with a walk-out view terrace. The spacious primary suite is equipped with a spa-like bathroom, dual sink vanity, a large, walk-in shower and plentiful closet space. The second bedroom also has an ensuite full bath with soaking tub and shower. A powder room off the living area adds additional convenience. In-unit laundry room and parking are included. All this in a premium Noe Valley location - one of San Francisco's most desirable neighborhoods! Walk Score of 99! Photos of similar unit. Finishes and layout may vary. Additional 2 and 3 bedroom units available, with decks, a yard, outdoor kitchens, and views!
Confidential Remarks: Four new construction units available to show. HOA dues TBD by new owners. For more information contact Mark Brown 415-359-5576 / mark@brownsf.com.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Located on the border of Noe Valley and Mission-Dolores, 3331 22nd Street is a grand scale, full-floor Victorian condo that has been tastefully renovated to blend old world charm and modern convenience. With three large bedrooms and two remodeled bathrooms, this quintessential San Francisco property features an abundance of period details such as high ceilings, anaglypta wallpaper and decorative fireplaces with marble mantels. The updated kitchen boasts top-of-line appliances including a wine bridge and is accompanied by a formal dining space with custom bench seating, fireplace, and built-in curio cabinet. The main living space with bay windows and custom built-ins is the perfect setting to entertain guests and features an adjoining bedroom/office separated by double parlor doors. Two additional large bedrooms with ample closet space and two remodeled bathrooms complete the offering. Having been seismically upgraded in 2017, new owners will find additional convenience in the 1 car parking, in-unit laundry, and shared outdoor space. With a 99 walk score, this urban location is hard to beat and within a stone throw of all the local shops and restaurants along Valencia, Guerrero and Mission St.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Super Charming Liberty Hill Victorian gem with Downtown VIEWS and a resort-style backyard oasis. With a coveted 98 WalkScore, this home epitomizes urban luxury and convenience. Step inside to discover a spacious living room adorned with a south facing bay window, perfect for soaking in natural light. The formal dining room features a wood-burning fireplace with marble, setting the stage for memorable gatherings. A chef's kitchen awaits, complete with marble counters, ample storage, and a skylit breakfast nook with custom built-in seating. Entertain effortlessly as the kitchen opens to a large, sun-drenched Ipe deck, ideal for al fresco dining and relaxation. Upstairs, the primary suite beckons with downtown vistas and a luxurious bath illuminated by a skylight. Outside, the expansive 2850 sq ft lot unveils a multi-tiered backyard retreat, complete with a wired and modern shed/office. Bonus garden-level spaces offer versatility as a guest room, artist studio/multimedia room, or home office. A chef's kitchen awaits, complete with marble counters, ample storage, and a skylit breakfast nook with custom built-in seating. Upstairs, the primary suite beckons with downtown vistas and a luxurious bath illuminated by a skylight. Outside, the expansive 2850 sq ft lot unveils a multi-tiered backyard retreat, complete with a wired and modern shed/office. Bonus garden-level spaces offer versatility as a guest room, artist studio/multimedia room, or home office. Owned solar panels, prime Liberty Hill location near restaurants, parks, and transportation hubs, including BART and MUNI, elevate the allure of this urban sanctuary. 3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Coveted Liberty Street! Perched above Dolores Park in one of SF's warm weather belts, this smartly renovated condo boasts stunning views spanning from Sutro Tower in the West to the East Bay Hills. Enjoy an ever changing sky with views of Buena Vista Park, Dolores Park, all of Downtown & the East Bay. Stylish & efficiently designed, this top floor condo sits at the back of the property in a boutique 6 unit HOA. Enjoy living at the border of 4 distinct & desirable hoods: Mission Dolores, Castro, Noe Valley & Mission. The condo is steps to the JChurch MUNI line, around the corner from Dolores Park, 2+ blocks to Valencia St & 4 blocks to 24th St. It's one of the rare elevator buildings in the hood. The current owners undertook a gut renovation, maximizing light, views & space. As featured in Kitchen Trends magazine, the thoughtful kitchen renovation includes: custom cabinetry, Caesar stone countertops, oven & steam oven, a freestanding cooktop & hood, built-in dishwasher, ample storage & radiant heated floors. The living area features handsome built-in storage & shelving. The skylit bath features radiant flooring, a double sink, large mirrored med cabinet, spacious walk-in shower, & in unit washer/dryer. There are 2 generous sized BDRs, dual pane windows, deeded parking & storage.
Confidential Remarks: Two of the six condos are rented. Major seismic retrofit completed in 2017. Roof replaced in 2017. Upcoming per unit assessment of $14,000+ for siding, painting, and window caulking.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Nestled on a prime block between the vibrant Valencia and Mission corridors, this bright and airy top-floor home boasts a striking Victorian facade. This remarkable condo showcases soaring ceilings, huge windows & a skylight, which bathe the home in sunshine. Meticulously maintained details abound, including beautiful softwood floors, picture rails and moldings, built-in cabinetry, and pocket doors. The expansive living room includes a gorgeous bay window with treetop views, an elegant stone mantel, and built-in shelving. An ample dining room, with charming built-in cabinetry, leads into the airy kitchen with abundant storage, a pantry nook, and an eat-in breakfast area. Large doors through the laundry room with custom millwork and stacked washer/dryer open to a walkout deck. The pergola and custom bench seating here are perfect for barbecuing and enjoying the warm Mission sunshine while overlooking the sunny shared yard. Three bedrooms and two full baths, incl. a primary bedroom w/ an ensuite bathroom, complete the home. A separate lower-level bonus room with wet bar & wine fridge offers an ideal WFH space. Amenities incl. two-car parking with EV charging capability. A+ location in a thriving neighborhood steps to world-class dining & nightlife, and many public transit options.
Confidential Remarks: Escrow opened with Heather Shiffer @ First American Title Co. All buyers to use the most current SFAR contract. Buyers advised to independently verify accuracy of all information provided. Please Call/text/email Dana Cohen @ (415) 305-3539, dana@teamrivet.com or Priya Agrawal @ (617) 513-7795, priya@teamrivet.com with any questions.

Set on one of the best blocks in SF with a warm community feel and walkable to Valencia, the Castro, Noe Valley, Duboce Triangle and of course Dolores Park, this home is perfectly situated to enjoy the best the city has to offer.

A center island can be placed to provide additional seating and enjoyment of this wonderful open space. The home exudes an artful ambiance as designer lighting fixtures gracefully illuminate the exquisitely finished hardwood floors, casting a warm glow that enhances the overall aesthetic of the home. It's been impeccably maintained and is one of three units in a well-managed boutique building. An in-unit laundry room, one-car tandem parking space, private storage and common garden complete this wonderful home.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Generously proportioned and AMAZINGLY located, this single-family home has great 'bones'' as they say. Built in 1922, the layout has spacious, open living spaces, showcasing gracious rooms and a double-wide front living area, abundant Craftsman-style built-in details mixed with modern amenities, and hardwood floors throughout. The enviable 3-level layout has living areas and 1 bath on the main level, 3 beds and 1 bath upstairs, plus a lower level guest suite and multi-purpose bonus room: super flexible for your office, workshop, gym, guests, you name it! Outside, enjoy your deep and secluded backyard surrounded by beautiful, mature plantings. All nestled on a tree-lined street next to Mission Dolores Park, only moments from shopping and dining on Valencia and the Mission, nightlife in the Castro, 16th/Mission BART, and more. A beautiful home in a vibrant, centrally located community, this one checks all the boxes. Tenant-occupied. See agent only remarks.
Confidential Remarks: We are only showing during posted times. Home is tenant-occupied. Month to month. Sold as-is and subject to tenants rights. Property has not been remodeled in many years; great bones. Lower level room(s) and bathroom may not be permitted. Buyer to investigate as desired. PLEASE NOTE: The seller and listing agent have NOT verified that the property has been properly disinfected and is NOT providing personal protective equipment at the property to protect against exposure to COVID-19. Any party who enters the home must provide their own appropriate protective items and must enter at their own risk. Buyers should investigate to their satisfaction.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Exquisitely renovated, this top-floor Edwardian view condo offers a luxurious urban retreat. The first level boasts two bedrooms and two full bathrooms, complemented by a captivating living-and-dining room ensemble featuring a cozy gas fireplace and a sunlit eat-in nook. The gourmet kitchen is a culinary haven, including a Thermidor induction range, Thermidor electronic oven, Thermidor dishwasher, Sharp drawer microwave, wine cooler and Bosch refrigerator. Adjacent to the kitchen is a convenient laundry room, complete with a Whirlpool front-loading washer and gas dryer. Separate electric heat pumps for each floor with separate thermostats. Ascend the brand new staircase to discover the second level, a versatile space perfect for entertaining. Through the triple sliding glass door awaits a private roof deck, showcasing a gas fire pit and breathtaking panoramic views. Throughout offers wide plank white oak flooring exudes sophistication. Included with the property is one car parking and storage in the garage. Enjoy an ideal Mission Dolores location within close proximity to Valencia Street's local cafes, world-class dining, shopping, entertainment, and outdoor recreation. Easy access to public transit makes this an urban dweller's dream. This residence effortlessly combines sty

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Located in San Francisco's landmark Liberty Hill district, this stylish house-like condominium exudes the ultimate in sophistication. This grand-scale full-floor flat includes 3 generous bedrooms, 2 stunning full baths, including a spacious primary bedroom with en-suite bath and walk-in closet, an elegant formal living room, and a beautifully-remodeled eat-in kitchen with adjacent formal dining room, complete with views overlooking the City. This magazine-quality Edwardian-era residence brings the City's rich history to life, with a remodel clearly executed with painstaking precision. Period details have been preserved and showcased, with practical needs also attended to, including ample closet space and in-unit laundry. Other treasures include a lovely shared deck, garage parking, gleaming wood floors, two gas fireplaces and much more. This urban paradise is just three blocks from iconic Dolores Park, and close to the bustling Mission District, and Castro and Noe Valley neighborhoods.
Confidential Remarks: Call for showings. Escrow pre-opened with Janette Marcelo, Old Republic Title.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Enjoy the best the Mission has to offer from this beautiful full floor Victorian condo. Redesigned for modern living, 375 Capp features a spacious open plan living area with stylish updated kitchen that leads directly out to a large sunny deeded garden area with sun deck and lush mature landscaping. The spacious 1400 square foot flat is comprised of three bedrooms and two full baths, including a generously sized primary suite. Highlights include soaring high ceilings and bay windows that flood the space with natural light. The kitchen features wood cabinetry, quartz countertops and stainless steel bosch appliances. Additional amenities include in-unit laundry, basement storage and one car garage parking. Situated in the heart of the Valencia Corridor with its many restaurants and boutiques, beautiful Dolores Park, public transportation, shuttle routes and freeway access, this centrally located home is the epitome of city living!
Confidential Remarks: Previous construction default lawsuit with developer has been settled, full details in disclosures. Can also be purchased as a vacant two unit building with 373 Capp, a top floor 3/2 condo. Offers welcome 8/9 by 2pm!
